All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bits
Represents a number of bits.
Chip8CPU
The default implementation of CPU.
Chip8CPUState
The default implementation of CPUState.
Chip8Interpreter
The default implementation of Interpreter.
Constants
Provides some constants that are used throughout the application.
CPU
Representation of the full system.
CPUProfile
A representation of the layout of the CPU, with definitions of the memory size, stack size, number of Vx registers, and number of bits used for each register and block of memory used by the CPU.
CPUState
Representation of the CPU state.
FullStackException
An exception that is thrown when the CPU's subroutine stack is full.
IllegalInstructionException
An exception that is thrown when an illegal Chip-8 instruction is provided to the interpreter.
Interpreter
Handles instruction processing.
MemoryBlock
A block of memory representing an array of Bytes.
Register
Representation of a single register that can store a specified number of bits.
ROM
Representation of a block of read-only memory containing byte data, where each register in the block is one byte.
